entry.title: WIND WARNING , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 over southern sections. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:22 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 2:22 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 2:22 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
